Package ba.unsa.etf.rpr.dao

Interface RentalDao

All Superinterfaces:
Dao<Rental>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RentalDaoSQLImpl
public interface RentalDao extends Dao<Rental>
Interface that extends the generic interface "Dao" Implements methods specific to working with book rentals
Author:
Amina Bajric

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Rental
    checkUsersRental(int memberID)
    checks whether the user with the id sent as a parameter already has a rental, if so it returns that rental, if not it returns null
    Book
    getBook(Rental r)
    returns the book that is rented
    List<Rental>
    getDeadlineExceedings()
    returns a list of all rentals where the return deadline has been exceeded
    Member
    getMember(Rental r)
    returns the library member who rented the book
    Rental
    rentABook(int memberID, int bookId)
    rents the book with id given by the parameter to the user whose id is also given by the parameter, unless he already has the book rented, in which case it returns null
    void
    returnRentedBook(int memberID)
    returns the book that was borrowed to the library
    List<Rental>
    searchByReturnDeadline(Date returnDeadline)
    returns a list of all rentals based on the specified return deadline date (for example, to be able to notify members whose return deadline is about to expire)

    Methods inherited from interface ba.unsa.etf.rpr.dao.Dao

    add, delete, getAll, insertAll, removeAll, searchById, update, viewAll

      returns a list of all rentals where the return deadline has been exceeded
      Returns:
      list of rentals
      Throws:
      LibraryException

    • searchByReturnDeadline

      List<Rental> searchByReturnDeadline(Date returnDeadline) throws LibraryException
      returns a list of all rentals based on the specified return deadline date (for example, to be able to notify members whose return deadline is about to expire)
      Parameters:
      returnDeadline - date of return deadline
      Returns:
      list of rentals
      Throws:
      LibraryException

    • checkUsersRental

      Rental checkUsersRental(int memberID) throws LibraryException
      checks whether the user with the id sent as a parameter already has a rental, if so it returns that rental, if not it returns null
      Parameters:
      memberID - id from library member
      Returns:
      Rental
      Throws:
      LibraryException

      Parameters:

    • rentABook

      Rental rentABook(int memberID, int bookId) throws LibraryException
      rents the book with id given by the parameter to the user whose id is also given by the parameter, unless he already has the book rented, in which case it returns null
      Parameters:
      bookId - id from a book
      memberID - id from a library member
      Returns:
      new rental or null
      Throws:
      LibraryException
